Uses of Class
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl.SqliteDbHelper

Packages that use SqliteDbHelper
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sql Provides utility classes for constructing and executing SQL statements. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite Provides the classes necessary for SQLite object-relational mapping. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework. 
 

Uses of SqliteDbHelper in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sql
 

Methods in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sql with parameters of type SqliteDbHelper
 int SqlBuilder.createTables(SqliteDbHelper dbHelper)
          Creates the model tables for the application in the SQLite database as configured in infinitum.cfg.xml and returns the numbers of tables created.
 int SqlBuilder.dropTables(SqliteDbHelper dbHelper)
          Drops the model tables from the application's SQLite database and returns the number of tables dropped.
